lead_paragraph: HALPERIN--Jesse. The Board of Governors and the members of The Seawane Club, record with profound sorrow the loss of our beloved member, Jesse Halperin. We extend heartfelt sympathy to his wife, Reva and the entire Halperin family. Jeffrey Greenfield President 1/3
